description: Simple, intuitive and logical every-day-usage additions to the Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 and newer. Follows the same namespace structure already found in the .NET Framework.
releaseNotes:
This is a minor release which adds a few enhancements, fixes a few bugs and applies some performance improvements.
The following work was completed for this release:

- A new enum was introduced in the Cuemon namespace; TimeUnit which specifies the unit of time for a TimeSpan
- A new enum was introduced in the Cuemon namespace; GuidFormats which specifies allowed GUID formats in parsing related methods
- A new static class was introduced in the Cuemon namespace; GuidUtility with the following members; TryParse
- A new static class was introduced in the Cuemon.Xml namespace; XmlReaderUtility with the following members; Chunk, MoveToFirstElement

- The ParallelLoopUtility class was aligned method wide to promote routine usage
- The ConvertUtility class was extended with these new methods; ToTimeSpan, ToGuid
- The StringUtility class was extended with a new static field; HexadecimalCharacters
- The XmlDataReader class, which was introduced recently, received a few bug fixes, performance optimizations along with some new features
- The XmlWriterUtility class was extended with these new methods; Copy
summary: Cuemon .NET Framework Additions is a free and flexible assembly package built to meet your potential. Limitless creativity for coders, programmers and developers.
title: Cuemon .NET Framework Additions
